name: My Dev Container
postCreateCommand: git clone https://github.com/your-username/your-repo.git && cd your-repo && apt-get update && apt-get install -y apt-transport-https && curl -s https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt/doc/apt-key.gpg | apt-key add - && echo "deb https://apt.kubernetes.io/ kubernetes-xenial main" | tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/kubernetes.list && apt-get update && apt-get install -y kubectl helm
